content.raw:
Prereleases for all the involved packages has been released. To use them, be sure to have the prerelease repo enabled and:

`sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y libsdformat8-dev libignition-sensors2-core-dev libignition-sensors2-dev libignition-sensors2-rgbd-camera-dev libignition-msgs-dev libignition-gazebo2-dev`

Reminder: before releasing the stable version be sure of merging [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors2-release/pull-requests/2/add-rgbd-camera-sensor/diff](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors2-release/pull-requests/2/add-rgbd-camera-sensor/diff)
content.html:
Prereleases for all the involved packages has been released. To use them, be sure to have the prerelease repo enabled and:

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y libsdformat8-dev libignition-sensors2-core-dev libignition-sensors2-dev libignition-sensors2-rgbd-camera-dev libignition-msgs-dev libignition-gazebo2-dev

Reminder: before releasing the stable version be sure of merging #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors2-release/pull-requests/2/add-rgbd-camera-sensor/diff
